mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rnum, t1.* FROM (SELECT * FROM Freeboard ORDER BY freeboard_no DESC)t1)t2 WHERE t2.rnum >= (#{currPage}-1)*10+1 AND t2.rnum <= #{currPage}*10

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rnum, t1.* FROM (SELECT F.* FROM Freeboard F , Employee E, Branch B WHERE F.emp_code = E.emp_code AND E.branch_no = B.branch_no
AND F.freeboard_title LIKE '%'|| #{freeboard_title} ||'%'
AND F.freeboard_content LIKE '%'|| #{freeboard_content} ||'%'
AND F.freeboard_writer LIKE '%'|| #{freeboard_writer} ||'%'
AND B.branch_name LIKE '%'|| #{branch_name} ||'%'
ORDER BY freeboard_no DESC) t1 ) t2 WHERE t2.rnum >= (#{currPage}-1)*10+1 AND t2.rnum <= #{currPage}*10

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT F.* FROM Freeboard F , Employee E, Branch B WHERE F.emp_code = E.emp_code AND E.branch_no = B.branch_no
AND F.freeboard_title LIKE '%'|| #{freeboard_title} ||'%'
AND F.freeboard_content LIKE '%'|| #{freeboard_content} ||'%'
AND F.freeboard_writer LIKE '%'|| #{freeboard_writer} ||'%'
AND B.branch_name LIKE '%'|| #{branch_name} ||'%'
ORDER BY freeboard_no DESC)
